root.description: 'Banana Meme'The game received some popularity among the Giant Bomb community, due to a seemingly suggestive statement in the press release, which was read out on the Giant Bombcast. At one point the press release mentions "If there is a banana in the way, simply whack it off the screen." However, Jeff Gerstmann read this out with a pause between the words "off" and "the", emphasising the statements supposedly allusion to masturbation, much to the amusement of the rest of the podcasters.Name ChangeÂ The card game in question.May 18th 2009, Engine Soft works released a press release saying that from now on Bang! would be renamed to "Bang Attack" to avoid confusion with the simmilary named (card) game produced by the italian company daVinci.
